pr_title: SQL: Do not clear query handles during split brain recovery

timeline.message: SQL: Do not clear query handles during split brain recovery

timeline.bodyText:
Wondering if we can leave an empty reset in case it might be used in the future, but probably not.
Also, I see there's a jetSqlCoreBackend but I can't find it. Is it used at all? cc @viliam-durina
timeline.author: mmedenjak

replies.bodyText: AFAIK it is used, the implementation of the Jet backend is located in the Jet repo.
replies.author: devozerov

replies.bodyText: Ok, looks good, it's not using reset to do something similar so all is well.
replies.author: mmedenjak
